Constructor Detail

PhysicalHead

public PhysicalHead(QueryInfo queryInfo,
                    SourceTupleStream[] sourceStreams,
                    SinkTupleStream[] sinkStreams,
                    java.lang.Integer responsiveness)
This is the constructor for the PhysicalSelect class that initializes it with the appropriate query info, source streams, sink streams, and the responsiveness to control information.

Parameters:
queryInfo - The information about the query
sourceStreams - The Source Streams associated with the operator
sinkStreams - The Sink Streams associated with the operator
responsiveness - The responsiveness to control messages, in milli seconds
